Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/95th
ShortDescription: Northbound 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 103rd, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 103rd, King Drive, 95th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
